titleStmt.title: The second part of the history of the valorous and witty knight-errant, Don Quixote of the Mançha. Written in Spanish by Michael Ceruantes: and now translated into English
Don Quixote. Part 2. English
titleStmt.author: Cervantes Saavedra, Miguel de, 1547-1616.
Shelton, Thomas, fl. 1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Eliot's Court Press] for Edward Blount,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved: The history of Don-Quichote. The second parte.
Running title reads: The second part of Don Quixote.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
